name: Laruaville 3
description:
In this game you have to restore seasons. Summer, Winter, Spring and Autumn aren't functioning properly, so you have to use your Match3 skills to get it fixed.
Build a town to recreate rain,snow,clouds and more.
Aside from that, there's some bonus games - Mahjongs and Spot The Difference scenes.
You can play Relaxed, Timed and Moves limited modes. And during the play you can switch the game mode.
Our Mahjongs aren't similar to regular Mahjongs, so we suggest you trying ours.
